mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT REVIEW_TITLE, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WRITE_DATE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, REVIEW_MENU, '/review/' || REVIEW_NO "url" FROM REVIEW JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(METTING_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') METTING_DATE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_IMG, MAX_PEOPLE, '/together/' || BOARD_NO "url" FROM "TOGETHER" WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY DATE_CREATED DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
